mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tab_orders_Detailed (detailed_money, detailed_check, detailed_percentage, detailed_parent_money, orders_sno, user3_sno, cdate) VALUES (#{money}, #{checkCode}, #{percentage}, #{totalMoney}, #{order.id}, #{agency.id}, #{createTime})

mapper.update: UPDATE tab_orders_Detailed SET detailed_money=#{money}, detailed_check=#{checkCode}, detailed_percentage=#{percentage}, detailed_parent_money=#{totalMoney}, orders_sno=#{order.id}, user3_sno=#{agency.id} WHERE detailed_sno=#{id}
